definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: This text introduces a measure system based on Single chip which can monitor displacements of the paper cutter.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於單片機的切紙機位移測量系統。

sentences.english: Results of far field displacement around a circular cavity are given.
sentences.chinese: 文中給出了圓孔周圍的遠場位移的數值結果。

sentences.english: The application of Michelson interference principle in measuring small displacement is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹邁克爾遜干涉儀原理在測微小位移中的應用。

sentences.english: This makes it possible to research the polarization in a ferroelectric substance by HRTEM.
sentences.chinese: 這是利用高分辨成像研究位移型鐵電體極化的基礎。

sentences.english: And the displacement of speckle image reflects the distortion or displacement of objects.
sentences.chinese: 而激光散斑圖像的位移可以反映出物體的位移或形變。

sentences.english: And the displacement of speckle image reflects the distortion or displacement of objects.
sentences.chinese: 而激光散斑圖像的位移可以反映出物體的位移或形變。

sentences.english: When Poissons ratio is zero, tile exact solution of displacement is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 當泊桑比爲零時，求得位移的精確解。

sentences.english: Pile cap can reduce lateral displacement of pile efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 承臺能有效減小土體及樁的水平位移。

sentences.english: Here, a high level of potential optimization can be exploited through the application of displacement sensors in fork-lift trucks.
sentences.chinese: 而採用位移傳感器的叉車可以提供衆多潛在優化可能。

sentences.english: This kind of interferogram carries double informations on quantity and direction of displacement vector.
sentences.chinese: 這種干涉圖含有位移的大小和方向的雙重信息。

sentences.english: A virtual displacements are small displacements, of several different directions permitted by to the constraints.
sentences.chinese: 虛位移是在約束容許的條件下可能發生的。

sentences.english: The corresponding field state consists of two displaced Fock states.
sentences.chinese: 相應的光場態爲兩個位移福克態的疊加。

sentences.english: Then a predetermining and surpassing the rigid displacements way is developed.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是小視場時剛體位移可達幾十個像素。

sentences.english: I then used this layer as a displacement map for my main piece of footage.
sentences.chinese: 然後我用我作爲一個主要的鏡頭位移圖件這一層。

sentences.english: The micro-motion mechanism is one of key components of precision machinery and precision instrument.
sentences.chinese: 微位移機構是精密機械和精密儀器的關鍵部件之一。

sentences.english: However if the constraints are unsteady, a small real displacement is no longer a virtual one.
sentences.chinese: 而在非定常約束下，微小實位移不再是虛位移之一。

definition: to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
vertigo/dizziness/fainting/feeling of swaying, head spinning, lack of balance or floating (e.g. from a stroke)/Taiwan pr. [xuan4 yun1]
to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
straight or circular throwing-knife used by ninja and samurai (loanword from Japanese 手裏剣 shuriken)
